alternate_methods:
To book your theory test by phone you’ll need a:

- valid **Great Britain or Northern Ireland** provisional driving licence
- credit or debit card (Delta, MasterCard, Visa or Visa Electron)
- email address for your booking confirmation to be sent to (if you don't have one you'll get a confirmation in the post)

$C
**DSA enquiries and bookings**  
**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm
$C

To book your theory test by post download the application form and send it with your payment to the address on the form.

You can pay by cheque or postal order, but **don't send cash**. Make your cheque or postal order payable to the 'Driving Standards Agency'.

$D

[Download ‘Postal application for a driving theory test’ (PDF, 356KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_4015378.pdf "Download ‘Postal application for a driving theory test’ (PDF, 356KB)"){:rel="external"}

$D

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
introduction: This is the official service for booking your driving theory test online. **You must pass the theory test before booking your practical driving test.**
more_information:
You’ll need a:

- valid **Great Britain or Northern Ireland** provisional driving licence
- credit or debit card (Delta, MasterCard, Visa or Visa Electron)
- email address for your booking confirmation to be sent to - **if you don't have an email address you won't be able to book online**

%If you took your theory test today but didn’t pass, you’ll have to wait at least 3 clear working days before taking it again.%

If you have any problems booking online, contact the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).

$C
**DSA enquiries and bookings**  
**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
**Email:** <customercare@pearson.com>  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm
$C

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice for DSA](/dsa-theory-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice for DSA") before you start your booking.

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
